mapper.select: SELECT created_at, count, product_id, user_id, (select product_name from sr_product where cart_item.product_id = sr_product.product_id) as product_name, (select product_price from sr_product where cart_item.product_id = sr_product.product_id) as product_price, (select product_image from sr_product where cart_item.product_id = sr_product.product_id) as product_image from cart_item where user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: insert into cart_item (product_id, created_at, count, user_id) values (#{product_id}, sysdate(), 1, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cart_count FROM cart_item WHERE 1 = 1
